import { MinusIcon, PlusIcon } from "icons" import { useState } from "react" const ItemCount = ({ stock, initial, onAdd }) => { const [quantity, setQuantity] = useState(initial) const increment = () => { if (quantity >= stock) return setQuantity(prev => prev + 1) } const decrement = () => { if (quantity <= 1) return setQuantity(prev => prev - 1) } return (
{quantity}
) } export default ItemCount
